lines.text:
[Tony has shot Frank after discovering he was sleeping with his mistress]
I loved you like a father
You disappointed the shit out of me.
I've got to help Joey with his homework. He's having a lot of trouble in school.
Of course he's having trouble at school, he hangs out with Tony Jr. Face it, these boys are never going to be Einstein.
God, you people work just like the mob! There's no difference.
Oh, there's a big difference, Mrs. de Marco. The mob is run by murdering, thieving, lying, cheating psychopaths. We work for the President of the United States of America.
You know, Angela, I've been thinking.
Well, there you go, working without tools again.
[after doing a hit on a commuter train]
How these people do it every day?
It's like fuckin' sardines!
Look, I fight for what's mine, I make no apologies. You can call me a ballbuster but it's just the way I am.
We're your friends, Angela, whether you like it or not.
Whose husband are you dog face?
Well I don't know. Whose husband are you looking for?
Mine.
Madame, you're supposed to stay in your seat until the plane comes to a complete stop.
Honey, forget about it!
Everything we own fell off a truck!
Cheers to elevators. You meet the nicest people in them.
Tony, are you afraid?
Afraid? With these gorillas around me, c'mon, I feel like a virgin at a eunuch convention.
